$ WHOAMI

Salemou alaykom . I'm Bahae Bahrini , AKA 'Buddurid' , a , tunisian , 21 yo , ICT engineering student .

I'm a CTF player with CrémeTartinéFabuleuse .

I mainly play PWN , else i play Reverse Engineering or Misc .

This blog will contain some writeups of the challenges i play or author (mostly PWN) .


$ CVE's

  • None (for the moment at least xD)

$ INTERESTS

As i deem I mastered (not delusional xD ) usual Userland exploitation (heap included) , I'm moving forward to learn these topics .

  • kernel exploitation , I'm starting with linux kernel .
  • browser exploitation . very interesting , still noob tho
  • vm escape . vmware , virtual box , docker escapes ...
  • mobile and hardware security

$ how do i waste my time ?

I'm an expert when it comes to this xD . I do like playing and watching football .

I play league of legends . I'm more of a storymode games enjoyer now .

I like watching series , breaking bad is my fav. I also watch anime very often .
